snippet: Petra Kvitova and Lucie Safarova won the opening singles matches to give the Czech Republic a 2-0 lead over Germany in the Fed Cup final on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Petra Kvitova and Lucie Safarova won the opening singles matches to give the Czech Republic a 2-0 lead over Germany in the Fed Cup final on Saturday.

headline.main: Czechs Take Lead Over Germany in Fed Cup
headline.print_headline: Czechs Take Lead Over Germany in Fed Cup
